entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'Harry' throughout the text. He is described as giving orders and trying to navigate a dark room.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A person who obeys Harry's order to shut the door. Mentioned only once in the text.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person who grabs Harry's arm in fear of the floor moving. Mentioned as being frightened and trying to protect Harry.

relationships.description: Harry gives an order to Neville, who obeys it by shutting the door.
Hermione grabs Harry's arm in fear of the floor moving, indicating that she is trying to protect him.
